mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RD_NOTICE (NOT_ID, TITLE, LONGTXT, NOT_TYPE, ATCH_FILE_ID, START_DT, END_DT, USE_AT, CREAT_DT, CREAT_ID) VALUES(#{notId}, #{title}, #{longtxt}, #{notType}, #{atchFileId}, #{startDt}, #{endDt}, #{useAt}, SYSDATE(), #{creatId})
mapper.select: SELECT NOT_ID, TITLE, LONGTXT, NOT_TYPE, ATCH_FILE_ID, START_DT, END_DT, USE_AT, CREAT_DT, CREAT_ID, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, LAST_UPDUSR_ID , if('ROLE_ADMIN' = #{schAuthorCode}, 'Y', if(CREAT_ID = #{schId}, 'Y', 'N')) MODIFY_AUTH FROM RD_NOTICE WHERE NOT_ID = #{notId}
SELECT COUNT(NOT_ID) TOTAL_CNT FROM RD_NOTICE a LEFT JOIN COMTNEMPLYRINFO b ON a.CREAT_ID = b.EMPLYR_ID WHERE a.use_at ='Y'
